newsitem.title: LEBANON: Israeli-backed militiaman wounded in south Lebanon.
newsitem.headline: Israeli-backed militiaman wounded in south Lebanon.

text.p: An Israeli-backed South Lebanon Army (SLA) militiaman was wounded on Monday when guerrillas shelled his post in Israeli-occupied south Lebanon, SLA sources said.
They said the SLA outpost was at Shoumariyeh on the edge of Israel's south Lebanon occupation zone.

No group immediately claimed responsibility. Pro-Iranian Hizbollah (Party of God) and other guerrillas wage attacks almost daily to try to oust Israeli and SLA forces from the south Lebanon border zone.
